ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard? [How many days have you played!?]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well he s a whole lot easier to camp now that he doesn t run so fast. Get a wizzie and root and burn since he can t break root anymore. He has this habit
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:52 AM 1/12/01 -0500, you wrote:
>We'd noticed! They fixed the spawn time of a_Minkin00 on the Concert Hall.
>
>I wonder what loot it drops...
>
> > message boards are seeing alot more of me since all this happened

Well he's a whole lot easier to camp now that he doesn't run so fast. Get a
wizzie and root and burn since he can't break root anymore. He has this
habit of changing servers though. :-p

From Allakahzam's Bestiary:

Minkin

Minimum Level: 1 Maximum Level: 60

Guards of Qeynos

Forum Messages:

If your a nec like me i was able to kick his butt at easy. Try it heck zone
is just a few steps away and u can pull him closer to the zone just in case
or if your scared just hit him with vortex, siphon strength and heart
flutter after sending pet first so the pet is agroed the most. Then hit
with englufing darkness and fear 2 times and hes dead so use all your mana
to make sure your safe from harms way. And dont worry about being manaless,
zone is right there not to mention pet can solo anything that might attack
you out of the blue.

Dsenier Formidilosus "Talons of Darkness"
